column4: is it safe to remove my current kernel? it is one from the "generic-pae" type. i don't use the "generic-pae" type. how do i disable or prevent from future updates to install the generic-pae kernels? thanks
don't remove your current kernel. Reboot to another one first (to make sure it works), then remove the kernels you don't want.
i got disconnected. i just came back to say thanks in case you didn't read it.
